value.title: Store and share files in your application with Azure Files
value.excerpt: Azure Files provides a cloud-based file share for storing and sharing files to applications. Whether it's an application hosted in Azure App Service, an Azure VM, or an on-premises app, Azure Files can store and share file access between one or more applications and systems in a secure and failure-resilient manner.

images.title: Store and share files in your application with Azure Files

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore modern data warehouse analytics in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore the processing options available for building data analytics solutions in Azure. You will explore Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Databricks, and Azure HDInsight.

topItems.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
topItems.excerpt: Examine the components of a modern data warehouse. Understand the role of services like Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Azure HDInsight. See how to use Azure Synapse Analytics to load and process data.

images.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

topItems.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore the different data ingestion options available when you are building a data warehouse with Azure. See how to use Azure Data Factory to ingest data into a data warehouse.

images.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure

topItems.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure services for performing data analytics, and explore the features of Azure Synapse Analytics.

images.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore relational data offerings, provisioning and deploying relational databases, and querying relational data through cloud data solutions with Microsoft Azure.

topItems.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure SQL Database, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, Azure Database for MySQL, and Azure Database for MariaDB. Explore scenarios for using these database management systems.

images.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure SQL Database, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, and Azure Database for MySQL.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Query relational data in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Structured Query Language (SQL), and how you can use it to query, insert, update, and delete data in a relational database.

images.title: Query relational data in Azure
Explore relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Migrate ASP.NET Apps to Azure
value.excerpt: Migrate ASP.NET web applications and their data to Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database to take advantage of the cloud.

topItems.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant
topItems.excerpt: Use the Azure App Service Migration Assistant to assess the readiness of a web app to be deployed on App Service, and perform the migration.

images.title: Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

images.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
Migrate an on-premises web application to Azure with the App Service Migration Assistant

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization

value.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates
value.excerpt: Learn how Resource Manager templates express your deployments as code, enabling you to deploy faster and more reliably.

images.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn what your customers are really saying about your product or brand when they send feedback. We'll create a solution that uses Azure Functions and the intelligence of the Text Analytics API to discover sentiment in text messages.

images.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API

value.title: Create a classification model with Azure Machine Learning designer
value.excerpt: Classification is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict categories or classes. Learn how to create classification models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.

images.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

value.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous delivery (CD) pipeline that automates the process of deploying your application.

images.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates
value.excerpt: Standardize and automate your virtual machine deployments to minimize manual configuration, variance, and errors.

images.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates

value.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
value.excerpt: A good Azure IP addressing schema provides flexibility, room for growth, and integration with on-premises networks. The schema ensures that communication works for deployed resources, minimizes public exposure of systems, and gives the organization flexibility in its network. If not properly designed, systems might not be able to communicate, and additional work will be required to remediate.

images.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment

value.excerpt: Examine the components of a modern data warehouse. Understand the role of services like Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Azure HDInsight. See how to use Azure Synapse Analytics to load and process data.

images.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore the different data ingestion options available when you are building a data warehouse with Azure. See how to use Azure Data Factory to ingest data into a data warehouse.

value.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore Azure SQL Database, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, Azure Database for MySQL, and Azure Database for MariaDB. Explore scenarios for using these database management systems.

images.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Introduce the foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product
value.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to our end users. Discover the first two foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product.

images.title: Introduce the foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product

value.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Learn how identity and access management work in Microsoft 365.

images.title: Overview of identity and access management in Microsoft 365

value.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

images.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database

value.title: Prepare your development environment for Azure development
value.excerpt: Set up your local development environment with several popular IDEs.

images.title: Prepare your development environment for Azure development

value.title: Query relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about Structured Query Language (SQL), and how you can use it to query, insert, update, and delete data in a relational database.

images.title: Query relational data in Azure

value.title: Stage a web app deployment for testing and rollback by using App Service deployment slots
value.excerpt: Use deployment slots to streamline deployment and roll back a web app in Azure App Service.

images.title: Stage a web app deployment for testing and rollback by using App Service deployment slots

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore non-relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore non-relational data offerings, provisioning and deploying non-relational databases, and non-relational data stores with Microsoft Azure.

topItems.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure Table Storage, Azure Blob Storage, Azure File Storage, and Azure Cosmos DB, and explore situations for using them.

images.title: Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Data Lake , Azure Blob Storage, and Azure File Storage.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying non-relational data services in Azure

topItems.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to upload and retrieve data held in Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Blob storage, and Azure File storage.

images.title: Manage non-relational data stores in Azure
Explore non-relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with its’ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly.

images.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to issue simple queries against Azure Synapse Analytics and how to visualize the data in both Excel and Power BI.

images.title: Query data in Azure Synapse Analytics

topItems.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
topItems.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase.

images.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure
value.excerpt: Azure supports three approaches to deploying cloud resources - public, private, and the hybrid cloud. Selecting between them will change several factors of the services you move into Azure including cost, maintenance requirements, and security. In this module, we will look at all three types and help you make an informed decision about which one to leverage for your services. We'll also quickly look at the service models supported by Azure which can help you determine the services you should start with when planning out an Azure deployment.

images.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure

value.title: Assess your existing software development process
value.excerpt: Use a value stream map to help you examine your existing processes and technologies.

images.title: Assess your existing software development process

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using Durable Functions.

images.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions

value.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage
value.excerpt: Implement the publish-subscribe pattern in the cloud using Azure Queue storage.

images.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage

value.title: Describe concepts of relational data
value.excerpt: Explore the relational model for databases, how tables are structured, how you can use indexes to improve query performance, and how you can use views to simplify complex queries.

images.title: Describe concepts of relational data

value.title: Develop, test, and deploy an Azure Function with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Create test and deploy Azure Functions using Visual studio and how to manage Azure Function code.

images.title: Develop, test, and deploy an Azure Function with Visual Studio

value.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Secure the traffic from your users all the way to your web servers by enabling TLS encryption on Application Gateway.

images.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
